funFacts.title: Baybayin's Unique Script Style
funFacts.description: Baybayin script is known for its flowing, artistic style, often compared to calligraphy. This ancient script enhances cultural expression and adds an artistic flair to modern design projects, making it popular for tattoos and creative artworks.

funFacts.title: Baybayin in the Digital Age
funFacts.description: Despite its ancient origins, Baybayin is being revived in the digital world. With tools like Baybayin Translator, more people are exploring this script, integrating it into digital media, and preserving cultural heritage through technology.
